channel.title: Emma Newman on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Emma Newman on Strat

item.title: Planetfall
item.description: People follow a prophet to a planet with alien life on it. Things quickly go wrong and everyone who’s left on the planet is stuck dealing with the consequences of their actions. Our protagonist Renata Ghali in particular is suffering through her existence on the planet and trying to come to terms with her role during Planetfall and the years that followed.
